items.sentence: I can\'t do a year\'s worth of work in three weeks.
Mary was deeply affected by her husband\'s passing.
Tom wanted to understand why Mary didn\'t like him.
Tom wants to know how long we\'re going to be here.
Tom didn\'t notice that Mary was flirting with him.
Tom didn\'t want to talk about that over the phone.
I had an interesting conversation with my neighbor.
I had no idea you were planning on going to Boston.
I had the chance to buy that, but I decided not to.
I had to push my bicycle because I had a flat tire.
